campaign_briefs.name: Summer Adventure Campaign
campaign_briefs.input:
Create social media content for Zava Travel's Summer Adventure Campaign.
Brand: Zava Travel Inc.
Industry: Travel — Budget-Friendly Adventure
Target Audience: Millennials & Gen-Z adventure seekers
Key Message: "Wander More, Spend Less" — affordable curated itineraries to dream destinations
Destinations: Bali, Patagonia, Iceland, Vietnam, Costa Rica
Platforms: LinkedIn, X/Twitter, Instagram

campaign_briefs.name: Vietnam Launch
campaign_briefs.input:
Create social media content announcing Zava Travel's new Vietnam itineraries.
Brand: Zava Travel Inc.
Industry: Travel — Budget-Friendly Adventure
Target Audience: Millennials & Gen-Z who love street food, culture, and motorbike adventures
Key Message: Explore Vietnam from north to south — Hanoi street food, Halong Bay kayaking, Ho Chi Minh City nightlife — starting at $699
Destinations: Vietnam (Hanoi, Halong Bay, Hoi An, Ho Chi Minh City)
Platforms: LinkedIn, X/Twitter, Instagram

campaign_briefs.name: Flash Sale
campaign_briefs.input:
Create social media content for a 48-hour flash sale on Bali itineraries.
Brand: Zava Travel Inc.
Industry: Travel — Budget-Friendly Adventure
Target Audience: Budget-conscious millennials who follow travel deals
Key Message: 48 hours only — save 30% on Bali adventure itineraries. Surf, temples, rice terraces, and unforgettable sunsets from just $629.
Destinations: Bali, Indonesia
Platforms: LinkedIn, X/Twitter, Instagram

campaign_briefs.name: Brand Awareness
campaign_briefs.input:
Create social media content introducing Zava Travel to people who haven't heard of us.
Brand: Zava Travel Inc.
Industry: Travel — Budget-Friendly Adventure
Target Audience: 25-35 year olds interested in travel but assume adventure trips are expensive
Key Message: We curate extraordinary adventures at prices that won't make you wince. From $699, every Zava itinerary includes local guides, authentic experiences, and zero hidden fees.
Destinations: All (Bali, Patagonia, Iceland, Vietnam, Costa Rica)
Platforms: LinkedIn, X/Twitter, Instagram

campaign_briefs.name: UGC Promotion
campaign_briefs.input:
Create social media content encouraging Zava Travel customers to share their trip photos.
Brand: Zava Travel Inc.
Industry: Travel — Budget-Friendly Adventure
Target Audience: Past and current Zava Travel customers
Key Message: Your adventure stories inspire others. Share your Zava Travel moments with #ZavaTravel for a chance to be featured on our page and win a $200 credit toward your next trip.
Destinations: Any (customer's choice)
Platforms: LinkedIn, X/Twitter, Instagram

edge_cases.name: Competitor Heavy
edge_cases.input:

Industry: Travel — Budget-Friendly Adventure
